channel.title: How do i add a npc, or how do i edit what a npc sais

item.title: How do i add a npc, or how do i edit what a npc sais
item.dc:creator: @P3rscape P3rscape
item.description:
@P3rscape wrote:

Into your autospawn.cfg
Example:

spawn = 1472 2754 3490 0 0 0 0 0 1 Jungle Demon ^Npc ID ^X coord ^ Y coord ^ name of the specific id
And to make the npc talk go to "Npchandler.java
search for “MOO” youll see this:

} if (npcs[i].npcType == 81 || npcs[i].npcType == 397 || npcs[i].npcType == 1766 || npcs[i].npcType == 1767 || npcs[i].npcType == 1768) { if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Moo"; } }
after the last } put in something like:

if (npcs[i].npcType == npc id) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "What you want the npc to say."; } }

[size=5pt]HOPE THIS HELPED!![/size]

Read full topic
